text: Hey everyone, it's great to be here!
speaker: Jake

text: I always knew I wanted to be a comedian, but I never thought I'd get to do it with such a great group of friends!
speaker: Jake

text: And speaking of friends, have you met my best bud Mike?
speaker: Jake

text: Hey there, I'm Mike. I love making people laugh and I'm always the first one to tell a joke.
speaker: Mike

text: But enough about us boys, let's talk about our fearless leader, Rachel.
speaker: Jake

text: I may be small, but I've got a big personality. I'm always up for a good time and I never back down from a challenge.
speaker: Rachel
